title: Connection Issues
body: It has been three days since this connection problem started. Every game i started no matter custom game or pvp, i just cannot connect to the game. it keeps popping out message such as failed to connect to server, disconnected due to network issues etc. And finally after three games of me 'AFK' ing, i get the AFK penalty. It makes me so frustrated, can anyone help?

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like your connection to our game servers is *poor* or *unstable*. This is likely caused by a conflicting network setting on your network, so working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) would be a great step to address this.

Let me know if those configurations weren't able to resolve this.
